# Available Datasets

| Dataset | Description | File Format | Source |
|---------|------------|-------------|--------|
| WGS Data | Whole-genome sequencing data for Alzheimer's patients | `.fastq`, `.bam` | [dbGaP](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gap/) |
| Microglia Transcriptomics | RNA-seq data of aged microglia | `.csv` | [GEO](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/) |
| GWAS Summary Stats | Public GWAS data for Alzheimer's risk loci | `.txt.gz` | [GWAS Catalog](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/gwas/) |

**Note:** Some datasets require access approval before downloading.

---

## Data Storage & Organization

- Raw data is stored on **HPC in `/scratch/user/data/`**  
- Processed results are in **`/scratch/user/analysis/`**  

If you need access to specific datasets, contact the analysis team.
